title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries for downloading and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push, and delete models.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package; install with pip install ollama.

title: ollama
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package; install with npm i ollama.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chat with multiple LLMs, import/export conversations.

title: open-webui/open-webui
summary: Community fork of the original ollama-webui with added RAG, plugin system, and user management.

title: langchain-ai/langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs, embeddings, and tool-calling agents.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI page for LangChain’s Ollama adapter; drop-in replacement for OpenAI in existing chains.

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rs/ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed API for chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat interface that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot using python-telegram-bot to query local Ollama models.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama’s HTTP API with GenServer-backed connection pooling.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client built with Bubble Tea (Go) that keeps conversation history in SQLite.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python demo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that exposes Ollama models as generators and embedders for building search pipelines.
